thread.title: 50 Cent Signs Contract With STARZ to Create More Shows
thread.title_full: 50 Cent Signs Contract With STARZ to Create More Shows | Examiner.com

author: Wanda Coppage
title: 50 Cent Signs Contract With STARZ to Create More Shows
text:
Photo by Bryan Bedder/Getty Images for JCPenney Rapper 50 Cent , real name Curtis Jackson , has already brought in a huge fan base to the Starz network with is hit show, Power, starring Omari Hardwick . The ratings for the tv drama has increased the overall viewership of the channel and prompted the cable network to offer Jackson a two-year exclusive premium television pact to create new shows.
UPI reported that Jackson is set to develop new projects for the network while continuing to executive produce, and star in his current show, Power . created by Courtney Kemp Agboh. According to the site, Starz is very proud or the success of the original series, and has contracted ten new episodes for season 3, which already in production .
Jackson will develop the new projects under his G Unit Film & Television, Inc., and is looking forward to furthering his business relationship with Starz. “Starz has been the perfect partner to make Power the success that it is and I am looking forward to developing many more record-breaking series with them,” said Jackson.
No word as of yet on what type of programming the "Get Rich Or Die Trying" rapper plans to bring but, Starz has complete faith in his ability to enforce great programming and producing. Managing Director of Starz, Carmi Zlotnik , stated, “Curtis is a wonderful hands-on producer and actor on ‘Power’ and we look forward to expanding his roles behind-the-camera with Starz over the next two years."
Jackson continues to build his brand and empire with several successful business ventures, and according to Forbes , it's paying off big time as the rapper's net worth is approximately $155 million. From films, to television shows, exclusive deals with energy drinks like, Vitamin Water and let's not forget his new branded liquor, Effen Vodka.
Read more of Jackson's successful businesses here.
